title: To use the same Names of Properties in WPF in ASP.NET too
body: In WPF you call it Background, but in ASP.NET you use Backcolor and in WPF it is Visibility and in ASP.NET it is Visible. That will the Software engjineer have to know. Probably now is the last Chance to introduce the same names in WPF in ASP.NET too.
